report.title: Heavenly High to the Depths of Hell
report.author: dontdoit
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I'm going to keep it brief don't do it. I've done a little of everything including daily marijuana use to MDMA a couple times a month for the last five years and it's nothing like this I would compare to mild Meth but the come down is much much worse. Take it from someone with much experience with drugs. Don't do it and I thought being e-tarded sucked guess again. /n /n [Reported Dose: '1gram']
